name: .BBTHEME
summary: Learn about .BBTHEME files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use a BBTHEME file as a Blockbench (cross-platform) theme:
In the Theme window, select Import Theme.
Navigate to and open your BBTHEME file.
Blockbench will then apply the settings your BBTHEME file contains.
Advanced users can edit a BBTHEME file's data directly by opening the file in Microsoft Notepad|microsoft/notepad} (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text or source code editor.
